title: Rik Van Looy (1933–2024): The ‘Emperor of Herentals’ Who Ruled the Monuments
content:
His victories across all five monuments and two world titles made him one of the superstars of the 1950s and 1960s. He died from a long illness at 90.

Read the full article at Rik Van Looy (1933–2024): The ‘Emperor of Herentals’ Who Ruled the Monuments on Velo.
author: ahood
